title: 363. Think Like a Winner
description: Great athletes aren’t just great at the physical stuff. They’ve also learned how to handle pressure, overcome fear, and stay focused. Here’s the good news: you don’t have to be an athlete to use what they know. (Ep. 4 of “The Hidden Side of Sports” series.)
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
